## Goal (WHY)
Enable representation of generated implications and their verification status.

## Interface Contract (WHAT)
```python
@dataclass
class Implication:
    source_understanding: str    # What we think we understand
    generated_claim: str         # What we predict should be true
    confidence: float            # How confident in this prediction
    generation_method: str       # How was this generated (pln, ngram, etc.)

@dataclass
class VerificationResult:
    implication: Implication
    verified: bool               # Did verification succeed?
    evidence: List[str]          # Supporting or contradicting evidence
    confidence: float            # Confidence in verification
    method: str                  # How was this verified (corpus, pln, etc.)
    
@dataclass
class UnderstandingState:
    original_input: str
    current_model: Dict[str, Any]  # Internal representation
    verified_implications: List[VerificationResult]
    refinement_count: int          # How many times refined
```

## Integration Points
- New file: cortical/reasoning/generative_loop.py
- Will be used by: GenerativeUnderstandingLoop in next task

## Test Requirements
Location: tests/unit/test_generative_loop.py (NEW file)

```python
def test_implication_creation():
    impl = Implication(
        source_understanding="Python uses indentation",
        generated_claim="Mixing tabs and spaces causes errors",
        confidence=0.8,
        generation_method="pln"
    )
    assert impl.confidence == 0.8

def test_verification_result():
    result = VerificationResult(
        implication=impl,
        verified=True,
        evidence=["Found in style guide"],
        confidence=0.9,
        method="corpus"
    )
    assert result.verified
```

Verification: python -m pytest tests/unit/test_generative_loop.py -v

## Anti-Patterns
- Do NOT skip serialization (to_dict/from_dict)
- Do NOT make structures too rigid
- Do NOT forget confidence tracking

## Freedom Zone
- Additional metadata fields
- Validation logic

## Reference: docs/epic-cognitive-nlu-nlg-knowledge-base.md
